body: This looks like a fairly interesting story. Shame it isn’t fully drawn, nor TRANSLATED. I would ask for a TRANSLATION, but, the comment message says I’ll die if I ask for a TRANSLATION. Maybe I’d be better off learning the written language... ;-;
why this art story never finish
Wow, if this got polished up as regular doujinshi, it would be even better, loli Satsuki is really hot
